text: Sorry to keep you waiting, Producer.

Good work, Sakuya.
I'll be counting on you for today's shoot.

Hey, can I ask you something?
Producer.

The job of a model is... to make the
clothes look beautiful and attractive, right?

But for idols—
I have to make myself look attractive.

Am I really appearing attractive
wearing this outfit?

Am I...
becoming the idol everyone wants me to be?
